assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Tafamidis_Initial_Patient_Overview_Q9_R1
assessmentQuestionVersion.responseValues: Anemia (Hgb <90 g/L) Cardiovascular events (i.e. HF exacerbations) Cerebrovascular accidents or intracranial hemorrhage Dementia Disabling hip fracture New or recurrent malignancies Palliative care or residing in long-term care facility Intensive Care Unit Admissions
